title: manci paNadirA (tAna varNa)
sahitya:
manci paNadirA ninnu jUci marulu konnadirA 
mArubAri tALadurA cakkani sAmigAvurA


anupallavi

  panca bANa janaka shri padmanAbha dAsa vancipAla 
bAlarAma varma kulashEkhara kirITapati citrOdaya nrpEndra


caraNam    rAja hamsa gamanirA nAduDani ninnu nammiyunnadirA purOvurA
